allow:
Bash(git commit -m "初始提交：完整的Java贪吃蛇游戏项目

🐍 添加了完整的贪吃蛇游戏实现
- MVC架构设计
- Swing GUI界面
- 完整的游戏逻辑
- 键盘控制和碰撞检测
- 计分系统和游戏状态管理
- Maven构建配置

🚀 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Add Claude Code Project with Snake Game and Checkout System

- Java Swing Snake Game with MVC architecture
- HTML5/JavaScript Snake Game (browser version)  
- Spring Boot Payment Checkout System with Allinpay integration
- Complete project documentation in CLAUDE.md

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove douabo folder

Clean up project structure by removing unused douabo directory.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
